---
layout: default
title: About us
---

h2. Who's behind all this?

"BigTuna":http://bigtuna.appelier.com has been designed and coded by "Michal Bugno":http://twitter.com/michalbugno and "Antek Piechnik":http://twitter.com/antekpiechnik, two "Ruby":http://www.ruby-lang.org/en/ developers from "Krakow, Poland":http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Krak%C3%B3w

h3. Contributors

Big thanks goes to a bunch of people who contributed with additional features (alphabetical order)

* "dbalatero":https://github.com/dbalatero -- Campfire hook, bugfixes
* "flamontagne":https://github.com/flamontagne -- xmpp hook
* "georgboe":https://github.com/georgboe -- bugfixes
* "knoopx":https://github.com/knoopx -- bugfixes
* "unsay":https://github.com/unsay -- Mercurial support
